text: We enjoyed our family dinner so much at Jiro last night.food was delicious and the service was really friendly.  Reservations was easy and the restaurant was not very busy, which we prefer.  Overall , we really liked the experience and will certainly go back again

Nice Cosy Japanese restaurant tuck in an industrial estate . Good place to unwind if you are working nearby .

Salad was well concocted with roasted pork belly and other vegetables/ greens .

Grilled hamachi collar was a little dry due to over grilling . Can be better .

Overall, great meal without breaking your bank !

Love  the ZEN ambience the moment I entered the restaurant! It would have been packed if it‚Äôs situated  in a busy shopping mall . Very suitable for business lunch and family dinners  .
Sashimi and Sushi were very fresh üëçand the Karaage Chicken is  well marinated,  Juicy and bursting with an invigorating aroma of gingerly sweet taste . Love it ! ‚ù§Ô∏è Mentaiko Fries was on point too !
Service Staffs were  warm n welcoming and food was well- served promptly.

We had a fantastic time at this humble Japanese restaurant that serves really fresh sashimi and seafood at prices that won't break the bank! Service was very good as well - the crew were polite, friendly and very attentive (our tea were refilled countless times without reminders needed). I really want to gatekeep this restaurant but I hope more people can enjoy their amazing food and hospitality!

Authentic japanese food with affordable price . And I like their sashimi which is very fresh and it is flown from Japan . Aburi salmon mentaiko is a must try sushi. It taste delicious with the smoky flavor and melt in mouth texture.If you are bring along kids, Hot Udon is a must have item for them. The broth taste pair so well with the chewy udon. We truly enjoy the authentic Japanese cuisine with the great ambience .
